org.flexiblepower.observation.ext

Class AbstractObservationProvider<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flexiblepower.observation.ext.AbstractObservationProvider<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObservationProvider<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleObservationProvider

    public abstract class AbstractObservationProvider<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObservationProvider<T>
    Gives a basic implementation of an ObservationProvider where the subscribe(ObservationConsumer) and unsubscribe(ObservationConsumer) methods are implemented. To publish a new observation, the publish(Observation) method should be used.

      • AbstractObservationProvider

        public AbstractObservationProvider()

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(ObservationConsumer<? super T> consumer)
        Description copied from interface: ObservationProvider
        Binds the consumer to this provider. After this call has returned, all the observations produced by the provider should be sent to this consumer via its ObservationConsumer.consume(ObservationProvider, Observation) method.
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface ObservationProvider<T>
        Parameters:
        consumer - The ObservationConsumer that will be bound to this provider.

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe(ObservationConsumer<? super T> consumer)
        Description copied from interface: ObservationProvider
        Unbinds the consumer from this provider. After this call has returned, the observations must no longer be sent to the consumer.
        Specified by:
        unsubscribe in interface ObservationProvider<T>
        Parameters:
        consumer - The ObservationConsumer that will be unbound from this provider.

      • getLastObservation

        public Observation<? extends T> getLastObservation()
        Description copied from interface: ObservationProvider
        Get the last published Observation.
        Specified by:
        getLastObservation in interface ObservationProvider<T>
        Returns:
        The last published observation, or null when no observation has been published yet.

      • publish

        public void publish(Observation<? extends T> observation)
        Publishes an observation to all the subscribed consumers.
        Parameters:
        observation - The observation that will be sent.
